title: Ascalon Naturopathic in Chesapeake, VA
description: Homeopathy, herbs, detoxification, energy work and reiki classes. Personal ascension guidance and channelings. Sliding scale discount fees for those who qu...
cleaned_text: Book an appointment [ ](https://squareup.com/appointments/book/914bcf8d-e31b-49a0-9b61-30edd09ab55c/FH524Z1VD55HS/start?service_id=3SLTG6JRUGQJFHDXJ4P5Z6YN) Pre-appointment 20 minute phone consult for new clients This is an optional 20 minute phone consult. If you are unsure what a standard consultation would entail, or have questions on whether or not my services are a good fit for you, this is an excellent way for us to initially connect. There is no cost for this consult. Please leave your phone number plus area code when you book online. Free · 20 minutes Book now [ ](https://squareup.com/appointments/book/914bcf8d-e31b-49a0-9b61-30edd09ab55c/FH524Z1VD55HS/start?service_id=CAU4GN3KI2J7UMAPRVO33LGW) Sauna and Ioncleanse Combined Detox Session 20-30 minute sauna treatment and a 30 minute Ioncleanse foot bath session to follow. Sauna utilizes infrared light therapy. Length of session depends on the individual. $35 · 1 hour Book now [ ](https://squareup.com/appointments/book/914bcf8d-e31b-49a0-9b61-30edd09ab55c/FH524Z1VD55HS/start?service_id=BRI3H7D2GL5Y4Z5K5KG7UXJZ) Quick Consultation In Office - 1 hour $55 · 1 hour Book now [ with one or two questions requiring discussion over the phone. 15-30-minute duration. $30 · 30 minutes Book now [ intake forms and consultation instructions once you have scheduled your appointment. *Keep a daily food journal for the week prior to your appointment. * Email any health history you feel is pertinent.* Includes remote bioenergetic assessment and iridology assessment please email a photo of each iris (can be taken with a smartphone camera and pen light; contact for instructions on how to do this). $99 · 2 hours 30 minutes Book now [ ](https://squareup.com/appointments/book/914bcf8d-e31b-49a0-9b61-30edd09ab55c/FH524Z1VD55HS/start?service_id=GZ74LLT5BW46KRA4RUTIH6BT) Reiki Distance Please arrive to your appointment well hydrated. $35 · 30 minutes Book now [ ](https://squareup.com/appointments/book/914bcf8d-e31b-49a0-9b61-30edd09ab55c/FH524Z1VD55HS/start?service_id=JX3BQ53YVIHUIPMN4NR24ACG) The Mothership 1 hour with Reiki Crystal Therapy Bed Session with Reiki (Includes Vogel Crystal Light Bed, Amethyst Biomat, Sound, and Aromatherapy) $111 · 1 hour Book now [ ](https://squareup.com/appointments/book/914bcf8d-e31b-49a0-9b61-30edd09ab55c/FH524Z1VD55HS/start?service_id=VNKPNMQEV325ESLPZKL6M5OZ) The Mothership 1/2 hour with Reiki Crystal Therapy Bed Session with Reiki (Includes Vogel Crystal Light Bed, Amethyst Biomat, Sound, and Aromatherapy) $65 · 30 minutes Book now [ ](https://squareup.com/appointments/book/914bcf8d-e31b-49a0-9b61-30edd09ab55c/FH524Z1VD55HS/start?service_id=EXUKVYQPI3HT5MZO75LGNB3B) Animal Consultation (Video Call) For dogs, cats, equines, exotics, and livestock. Includes Bioscan assessment. I will email you the intake forms and consultation instructions once you have scheduled your appointment. Shower available if you wish to rinse off afterwards. $20 · 30 minutes Book now [ ](https://squareup.com/appointments/book/914bcf8d-e31b-49a0-9b61-30edd09ab55c/FH524Z1VD55HS/start?service_id=FO5LIISSDU6K3JLDJA4QZJLH) Amethyst Biomat Session 1 hour $40 · 1 hour Book now [ ](https://squareup.com/appointments/book/914bcf8d-e31b-49a0-9b61-30edd09ab55c/FH524Z1VD55HS/start?service_id=3RMXGPDSDV2XT6DS4GMHNLAY) Amethyst Biomat Session 1/2 hour $20 · 30 minutes Book now [ ](https://squareup.com/appointments/book/914bcf8d-e31b-49a0-9b61-30edd09ab55c/FH524Z1VD55HS/start?service_id=HFWWF5HZZG26XMXUEU2XTSNE) IonCleanse Foot Bath Session Will take 10 to 30 minutes depending on the individual. $20 · 30 minutes Book now [ ](https://squareup.com/appointments/book/914bcf8d-e31b-49a0-9b61-30edd09ab55c/FH524Z1VD55HS/start?service_id=B6H2QBQCE6O6USU4XQKHPAJ3) Ioncleanse Session w/Sound Therapy $35 · 30 minutes Book now [ ](https://squareup.com/appointments/book/914bcf8d-e31b-49a0-9b61-30edd09ab55c/FH524Z1VD55HS/start?service_id=CNBSSCHSWI2X7HFNLWTTSAR6) HUSO Sound Therapy Session $20 · 30 minutes Book now [ ](https://squareup.com/appointments/book/914bcf8d-e31b-49a0-9b61-30edd09ab55c/FH524Z1VD55HS/start?service_id=YFYVOCVIOEVRTUS3FEVETKHM) Ear Candling Three candles per ear. Additional candles $5 each. $20 · 40 minutes Book now [ ](https://squareup.com/appointments/book/914bcf8d-e31b-49a0-9b61-30edd09ab55c/FH524Z1VD55HS/start?service_id=HNVOJPLNKGSYRZ7K2QEN4BLN) Reiki Level 1 class $250 · 6 hours Book now [ ](https://squareup.com/appointments/book/914bcf8d-e31b-49a0-9b61-30edd09ab55c/FH524Z1VD55HS/start?service_id=JJHH6IPMC2Q2XNIAQQUA6FUO) Reiki Level 2 class $350 · 6 hours Book now [ ](https://squareup.com/appointments/book/914bcf8d-e31b-49a0-9b61-30edd09ab55c/FH524Z1VD55HS/start?service_id=GCUDVSS63M3MAKGNCJZOKWVQ) Reiki Master Level Class Day One Two day class so be sure to book for Day One and Day Two, at least one week apart from each other.
